column4: so, if im able to find support on installing any package on any distro (not using package mannaager, but using console), it doesn't really matter whitch distro im using, isn't it?
i guess i gotta go some other distros irc chann...
you don't want to install, maintain and tweak each package yourself, that's why you should use a distro that does what you want all by itself, or makes doing what you want easier =)
